skins.selfIntroduction: Even though Chitose and I were seaplane tenders, after a loss in a certain battle, we were both remodeled into aircraft carriers. ...Even so, neither of us were able to be of much use until the end... Ahahaha....
skins.acquisition: Hehe, looks like I've kept you waiting! I am the renowned seaplane carrier®C err, I mean, aircraft carrier, Chiyoda! In any case, I'll be staying here! Right, right, is my sister Chitose here as well?
skins.login: Today's another great day to show off my amazing prowess! Commander, let's get pumped!
skins.details: I help Chitose out with her Shinto duties sometimes. You know, as a shrine maiden. ...Huh? You think I'd be more of a hindrance...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Taaake that! ...Hmm? No reaction... Commander, sometimes you're so much like Chitose, it's honestly quite a letdown...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Doesn't Chitose have really silky hair that smells just divine? Actually, I'm the one who takes care of it everyday.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Whenever we rehearse the dance with Yamashiro and Fusou, some kind of trouble always occurs... Like something falling, or flying off somewhere. But really? I find it all to be pretty funny!
skins.secretaryTouch: Am I so beautiful that I caught your eye? I'm flattered, but you should focus on your work for now~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Yikes?! If you had done this to Chitose instead, she'd have turned bright red from embarrassment!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Hehehe~ Commander, do you prefer them long or short?

skins.shipDescription: Hehe~ If you don't have any other plans, then your only task... is to enjoy a holiday by the sea! Commander, have you switched into vacation mode yet?
skins.acquisition: Hehe~ If you don't have any other plans, then your only task... is to enjoy a holiday by the sea! Commander, have you switched into vacation mode yet?
skins.login: Since we're here anyway, we've gotta enjoy the day to the fullest! We can start by playing with some balls. Catch, Commander!
skins.details: Heehee... Commander, take this! A direct hit from my water gun! Oh, you got some saltwater in your mouth? I'm terribly sorry... So, Commander... tell me, how did it taste? Hahaha~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hmm, beach volleyball? ... I'll use my powers to turn Saratoga into a holey woman! Ain't that right, Chitose?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The summer sun, the sparkling sea... Stop lazing around and come play with me already, Chitose~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, Yamashiro and her sister came too. Wouldn't it be a good idea to team up with them? Well?
skins.secretaryTouch: The glamorous Chiyoda in a swimsuit~! No matter how breathtaking I might look, don't just stand there and stare like an idiot. C'mon, let's go and play~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you're looking for something nice and round, I can throw this ball at your face, you know...?
